Package dynamicAnalysis

Class MemoryComposite

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
dynamicAnalysis.MemoryComposite
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable
public class MemoryComposite
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
The composite to display the virtual memory in the GUI

  • Field Details

    • memoryField

      private org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Text memoryField
      The GUI text field containing the raw memory space.

    • processId

      private int processId
      The unique identifier for the process.

      The bytes.

    • asciiTable

      private org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Table asciiTable
      The virtual table to display ASCII strings contained within the virtual memory.

    • searchText

      private org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Text searchText
      The text field to input search values.

    • tableStore

      private org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TableItem[] tableStore
      A temporary location to store the table when a search is performed. It is used while the contents are removed from the GUI.

    • tableItems

      private org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TableItem[] tableItems
      The table items.

    • asciiSections

      private java.lang.String[] asciiSections
      The array of ASCII sections found in the virtual memory.

    • red

      private org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color red
      SWT color for highlighting the table red.

    • memory

      private java.lang.String memory
      The string value containing the virtual memory.

    • memoryCount

      private final int memoryCount
      the amount of characters to display in the memory text field. Used to increase performance.

      Constant Field Values

    • MemoryComposite

      public MemoryComposite​(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent, int style, org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color green)
      Create the memory composite.
      Parameters:
      parent - the main window that acts as the parent
      style - the SWT style applied to the composite
      green - the SWT color green

  • Method Details

    • getProcessId

      public int getProcessId()
      Gets the process id.
      Returns:
      the process id

    • setProcessId

      public void setProcessId​(int processId)
      Sets the process id.
      Parameters:
      processId - the new process id

    • readMemory

      private byte[] readMemory()
      Calls the method to retrieve the virtual memory space of an application from its process ID.
      Returns:
      the byte array containing the entire virtual memory space

    • getBytes

      public byte[] getBytes()
      Gets the virtual memory space.
      Returns:
      the virtual memory space byte array

    • setBytes

      public void setBytes​(byte[] bytes)
      Sets the virtual memory space.
      Parameters:
      bytes - the new virtual memory space.

      the SWT color red

    • setRed

      public void setRed​(org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color red)
      Sets the SWT color red.
      Parameters:
      red - the new SWT color red

    • updateMemory

      private java.lang.String updateMemory()
      Retrieve the memory text field with the current values stored within.
      Returns:
      the updated memory space

    • findAsciiSections

      private java.lang.String[] findAsciiSections()
      Looks through the virtual memory space for sections containing ASCII values. The threshhold is at least 8 readable characters in a row. The complexity of this algorithm is O(N).
      Returns:
      the string array containing sections of readable data from the virtual memory space

    • isAscii

      private boolean isAscii​(char character)
      Checks if a character is ASCII.
      Parameters:
      character - the character to check
      Returns:
      true, if the given character is considered ASCII

    • search

      private java.lang.String[] search​(java.lang.String[] entries, java.lang.String toSearch)
      The search algorithm that filters the readable data.
      Parameters:
      entries - the ASCII string array
      toSearch - the value to search for
      Returns:
      the filtered ASCII string array that match the search

    • searchEvent

      private void searchEvent()
      When a search request is supplied by the GUI, this method gets called first.

    • populateMemory

      private java.lang.String populateMemory​(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Text text, int memoryIndex, java.lang.String tableText)
      Populate the memory text space. Split from main process to increase performance.
      Parameters:
      text - the GUI text field for the memory
      memoryIndex - the memory index
      tableText - the table text
      Returns:
      the new memory

    • checkSubclass

      protected void checkSubclass()
      Check subclass.
      Overrides:
      checkSubclass in class org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
